title: Herb Ellis & Ross Tompkins - A Pair To Draw To (1976) [Jazz][fla
description:
Herb Ellis & Ross Tompkins - A Pair To Draw To 
Recorded at Coast Recorders, San Francisco, CA in 1976
Year: 1976
Label: Concord Jazz   CJ-17
Bitrate: flac

"A nice balance of guitar and piano in a duet setting.  Both artists are accomplished professionals and it shows on this pairing.  

Ellis has played with the likes of Ella, Oscar Peterson and Ben Webster to name but a few.  Tompkins, the Tonight Show pianist for 

nearly 10 years has also played with Benny Goodman in the late 50's.  There's a few old standards here that you may recognize 

and a few new tunes that may become standards over time.  A nice cover photo and informative liner notes complete the package."
 
Personnel:
Herb Ellis: guitar
Ross Tompkins: piano
 
Herb Ellis & Ross Tompkins - A Pair To Draw To TrackS;
Side A
01  They Didn't Believe Me (Jerome Kern / Herbert Reynolds) 3:24
02  Here's That Rainy Day (Johnny Burke / James Van Heusen) 3:35
03  Someday My Prince Will Come (Frank Churchill / Larry Morey) 4:48
04  You and the Night and the Music (Howard Dietz / Arthur Schwartz) 4:37
05  A Nightingale Sang in Berkeley Square (Eric Maschwitz / Manning Sherwin) 3:41

Side B
01  You Stepped Out of a Dream (Nacio Herb Brown / Gus Kahn) 4:45
02  A Child Is Born (Thad Jones) 3:23
03  Spring Can Really Hang You up the Most (Tommy Wolf / Fran Landesman) 5:57
04  The More I See You (Mack Gordon / Harry Warren) 4:47
